Coming from the back, Shadow Star sends two balls of fire hurling at 
Devilcat.

Shadow Star: Ease off, lady. I have come to rescue you, not take you 
as a prisonner. The same for you, stranger.

Vlad knew he was adressed to. He would like answers but...

Vlad: Know this all of you. I am a Clansman and I see this as a Trial 
of Possession for us two. In the tradition set by the great Nicholas 
Kerensky, I will belong to the winning party.

He was not very hot at becoming a bondsman, but he needed answers. 
Besides, he could just make his way back to the top.
